name: Doom Chronicles: Zodiac Base
description: After you escaped with the chopper from the Base 63, You got home, alive and well. They have a another mission for you, this time it is the Zodiac Base, this base was runned by a before fallen company called Texxus Zodiac Ltd, But now it is been used by the Army, What we know is that Zodiac Base is overrun by demons, how did it happen? Well when the Base 63 experiment gone wrong, the experiment created some teleporters where demons are coming from, now the whole country is overrun by demons. now we have to clear the whole country. But first: The Zodiac Base.
